attributes.title: Go Away ✨🧚🏽‍♀️💓🥳🥺🤍
attributes.review: His is a HORRIBLE person who never even deserved an app ! the people who help but this app together need lethal injection and he needs a chair but, make it extra ELECTRIC 💗🤩✨🧚🏽‍♀️🧸🥱. anyways chile umm yeah just get this app off of here already bc gen z is on a roll 🥳,

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: The app is slow and the person on the front is terribly discolored he looks like a melted cheeto! It asks for my phone number which could be used to stalk me and hack me. Its paid for by tonald dump? Do not get this app.

attributes.title: smelly 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app all i could smell was soggy cheetos 😡🤢 also after using the app for a while it called me the n word 😭😰 i would not recommend this app whatsoever 👎🏾 and if you do download it rate it ONE (1) STAR -⭐️😾

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Ugh... I opened this app and it literally made my whole entire body clinched and the unclenches. I had a whole spasm attack and then I swear... I swear I could see all people he hurt and put in cages and raped... man this app is horrible!

attributes.title: worst app i have ever used
attributes.review: this app is a waste of space 🤬. i as disappointed in y’all’s  president how could he let something like this out into the world 😱. this is a shame he won’t be getting my vote for 2020. VOTE BIDEN !!!!

attributes.title: Highly disappointed
attributes.review: I expected better from our president but now I know to keep my expectations even lower than before

attributes.title: Terrible!!!😡😡😡
attributes.review: My names Cathy and I have 10 kids with my husband who likes to hunt!!!! I am NO LONGER a trump supporter Because I have TWEETED at him MILLIONS OF TIMES my daughter ANNA MARIE wants MONEYYYY for her DREAM CAR he IS a TERRIBLE person..that’s a joke I’m part of gen z but he’s a rapist soooooo BUT THE APP IS SLOW AND TERRIBLE AND IT MAKES YOU DONATE 300 dollars TO HIS CAMPAIGN🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: This app killed my brother
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I heard dreaded screams coming from downstairs. I rushed down to see my brother on fire in the living room. It’s also stealing people’s information. 1 star.

attributes.title: Need some more education
attributes.review: This app is run by a person who doesn’t care about anyone other than himself. He has taken advantage of underage girls and covered it up. He and his supporters need to get educated on how to treat human beings

attributes.title: App is weird
